author: @0xyGen_2.p0
text:
Thank you attorney Ko Great analysis as always About NJs members claiming that they want to be with MHJ no matter of the  outcome of the judgement which was probably meant strategical  to influence the court to decide that future cooperation with Ador is no longer possible and rule in favor of their contract termination  that statement is in my opinion at the same time also potentially very contraproductive Firstly because with this statement they indirectly admited that they are active part of tampering and secondly because with this statement they directly admit that nothing they reasoned as cause of their contract terminations with Ador actually stands is true and that in core of their unilateral contracts terminations werent Adors faults real or made up but something else   the desire to be with Min Hee jin  With that also NJs direct support to her tampering 

What is worse NJ members were publicly claiming from November last year that MHJ never had anything to do with their contract termination but now they openly indirectly admit that they lied and that MHJ was probably the ONLY reason why they terminated their contracts And that they were publicly attacking Ador as we could see from presented evidence in court with direct lies or distorted truths and with false testimony in National Assembly to justify contracts termination 

This seems to me as they indirectly comfirmed that Ador was actualy the victim of their and MHJs dirty game behind which was tampering Your thoughts on this

 And I checked two members seem to had tablets in court Im still in shock about how is this possible and why judges didnt punish them for it Of course I have no idea about what is a practice regarding this in Korea however in my country this would be considered as serious breach of court order and as direct disrespect of court and huge minus for these girls arguments in court 

 They also showed disrespect toward Ador CEO in the court room something we already saw in the National Assembly And they again pulled out a tear jerker while in court but completely different picture outside of court This brings memories on how was Hanni laughing in live stream how her tear jerker in National Assembly worked well Impression was that she almost admitted that her tear jerker was staged Will this affect judges anyhow 

And do you think that court can NJ members still consider as reliable witnesses since impression is that they lied in past and that they easy pull out lies and manipulations at any occassion to achieve their goals Even in court crokodile tears How will judges in your opinion approach to these evident manipulations  Court testimonies are given under oath of saying truth Thank you for your answers

author: @nneichan9353
text:
I have felt for a while now that NJs will be allowed to terminate their contract mostly through their own refusal to continue a professional relationship with ADOR and the claim it will damage them emotionallyÂ 

I do think they will pay penalties but that the costs will not be as high as it should be for the termination and impact on the company which honestly isnt at faultÂ 


If one is honest it is clear this is about MHJ and their reliance on her There is a recognizable desperation to return to her and work with her The relationship brings to mind a Svengali type dependence


I am seriously disappointed with the evolution and what looks like embellishment of the facts in the case especially the ignore her incident
